system.description: 1/Violence, when an enemy attacks an ally, you can burst into a run: rush your Speed + 1. If you: move into the attack's line of effect, end adjacent to the enemy, or end adjacent to the ally, you can knock the attack away, cancelling it completely.
system.flavor: "ATARAKA! Do you not understand! This is the Will of Lightning! Streak brighter and illuminate the entire sky, even for a second! That's all we have to do for people to remember our names! Now get up, GET UP! OUR WORK IS NOT DONE!" - Usisi, The Fulmination, to her ally Sajira Ataraka of the Shattered Javelin.
